item.description:
Ladies, come join me for a different kind of workout! THIS CLASS HAS BEEN TOTALLY REDESIGNED! Bridget begins with about twenty minutes of strength training that's sure to sculpt lean arms, legs, hips, butt, and abs. You're body won't believe you're only using 2 or 3 pound hand weights as you work through the different exercises that you wouldn't normally find in a strength training class! Next you switch gears into a smooth workout that includes belly dance, latin dance, hip hop, and pilates, before really breaking a sweat learning and rehearsing a fun and flirty chair routine! You'll actually have some fun while getting in shape!

*To attend this class you must register here: http://bridgetsdances...
You don't have to pre-pay, just enter some basic info so the instructor knows your coming.

The class is $10 or you can purchase a pack of ten for $90 (can be mixed and matched with Hip Hop and pilates)

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Strip Fit
